You can change the name and description of a Visualization card in Analyzer. For best practices in naming and describing Visualization cards, see [Best Practices for Standardizing Visualization Cards](..\best_practices_for_standardizing_visualization_cards\index.qmd "Best Practices for Standardizing KPIs").


**To change the name or descriptionÂ of a Visualization card,**


1. In Analyzer, click on the edit icon next to the current card name.
2. Enter the name and/or description you want in the required fields.
3. Save your changes.
